title: Where to buy oce league of legend cards online
body: So I live in North America, but I play on the OCE server, mainly why because i have friends that live in NZ and they play on the OCE, but i cant purchase rp with my 350$ gift card, or use League of legend RP cards from NA to OCE. I used a debit card before andit worked but i cant use it now

replies.body: Have you tried using PayPal instead of a credit/debit card?
yes it says the same thing, about my provider denying it, but its not my card because I bought something right after

> [{quoted}](name=Socked,realm=OCE,application-id=ElA0rvVL,discussion-id=4cx8rnyG,comment-id=00000000,timestamp=2015-12-26T19:30:46.758+0000)
>
> yes it says the same thing, about my provider denying it, but its not my card because I bought something right after

This is likely a security feature with either the merchant platform or the PVP.net Store. As such, please try submitting a ticket to Riot Games Player Support so that the Billing Department can hopefully give some insight into why you're seeing the issue and how you can subsequently purchase Riot Points on Oceania. Sorry I couldn't be of more assistance.
